thread.title: Elon's Berkane takes CAA rookie honor in men's soccer
thread.title_full: Elon's Berkane takes CAA rookie honor in men's soccer

author: Times-News
title: Elon's Berkane takes CAA rookie honor in men's soccer
text: Posted Oct. 12, 2015 at 5:37 PM Updated Oct 12, 2015 at 5:38 PM By Times-News Posted Oct. 12, 2015 at 5:37 PM Updated Oct 12, 2015 at 5:38 PM RICHMOND, Va. — Amir Berkane of the Elon men’s soccer team was named the Colonial Athletic Association Rookie of the Week after helping the Phoenix to a 2-0 record last week. He accounted for three points, including the game-winning goal against Northeastern. Berkane provided an assist on Elon’s lone goal in its 1-0 non-conference victory against Lipscomb. By Times-News
